description: This course will show you how it is possible to save hundreds of dollars every month on your grocery bill using coupons, even if you have no prior experience with couponing! Learn everything from how to read a coupon, where to get them, what other supplies you'll need, and how to effectively use them to reduce your grocery bill. After going through the course, the lectures can be used as stand-alone references to answer your questions on specific topics. Use the supplemental resources to assist you in tracking how much you may be spending, and how much less you could be spending, once you learn the strategies shared in this course.
title: Anyone Can Coupon and Save Hundreds Every Month!
